lines.text: What if... they put the sticker on the <c=#0000FF>Living Memory,</c> not the bullet itself?
On the bullet in the hologram! And then, that'd turn around, and...
I- no, this can work, um...
I'm not really thinkin' it can.
Okay, okay, so... maybe the hologram shows...
...um, the... well, I guess the sticker's not on the bullet in that, so...
It's definitely showing... before the sticker was used.
If there is, I ain't seein' it.
